Hello APIs

Users API Endpoints

  1. GET ALL THE USERS

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/users

  2. REGISTER A USER

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/users/register

  3. LOGIN A USER

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/users/login

  4. UPDATE A USER

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/users/updates/:userID

  5. DELETE A USER

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/users/delete/:userID

Admin API Endpoints

  1. GET ALL THE ADMINS

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/admins

  2. REGISTER ADMIN

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/admins/add

  3. LOGIN ADMIN

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/admins/login

  4. UPDATE A ADMIN

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/admins/updates/:adminID

  5. DELETE A PRODUCT

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/admins/delete/:adminID

Cart API Endpoints

  1. GET ALL THE USERS

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/cart

  2. Add A Item into Cart

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/cart/add

  3. UPDATE A Item from Cart

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/cart/updates/:userID

  4. DELETE A Item from Cart

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/cart/delete/:userID

Products API Endpoints

  1. GET ALL THE MEN'S PRODUCTS

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/menproducts

  2. POST A PRODUCT

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/menproducts/add

  3. UPDATE A PRODUCT

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/menproducts/updates/:userID

  4. DELETE A PRODUCT

    https://maroon-sea-urchin-tam.cyclic.app/menproducts/delete/:userID
